name: station_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bart.
Tool description: The BART API gives you access to pretty much all of the BART service and station data available on the BART website.
API description: Retrieves station information from the BART (Bay Area Rapid Transit) API.

cmd.description: A command code that specifies the type of station information to retrieve. See examples at http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/examples.aspx.
